remove_whitespace.hpp

00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_REMOVE_WHITESPACE_HPP

00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif

00019 #include <cassert>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp> // for BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00022 
00023 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00024 
00025 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/iterator/filter_iterator.hpp>
00027 
00028 //#include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00029 //#if ! BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <=1300)
00030 
00031 // here is the default standard implementation of the functor used
00032 // by the filter iterator to remove spaces.  Unfortunately usage
00033 // of this implementation in combination with spirit trips a bug
00034 // VC 6.5.  The only way I can find to work around it is to 
00035 // implement a special non-standard version for this platform
00036 
00037 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CWCTYPE
00038 #include <cwctype> // iswspace
00039 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00040 namespace std{ using ::iswspace; }
00041 #endif
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #include <cctype> // isspace
00045 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00046 namespace std{ using ::isspace; }
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #if defined(__STD_RWCOMPILER_H__) || defined(_RWSTD_VER)
00050 // this is required for the RW STL on Linux and Tru64.
00051 #undef isspace
00052 #undef iswspace
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 //#endif // BOOST_WORKAROUND
00056 
00057 namespace { // anonymous
00058 
00059 template<class CharType>
00060 struct remove_whitespace_predicate;
00061 
00062 template<>
00063 struct remove_whitespace_predicate<char>
00064 {
00065     bool operator()(unsigned char t){
00066         return ! std::isspace(t);
00067     }
00068 };
00069 
00070 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CWCHAR
00071 template<>
00072 struct remove_whitespace_predicate<wchar_t>
00073 {
00074     bool operator()(wchar_t t){
00075         return ! std::iswspace(t);
00076     }
00077 };
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 } // namespace anonymous
00081 
00083 // convert base64 file data (including whitespace and padding) to binary
00084 
00085 namespace boost { 
00086 namespace archive {
00087 namespace iterators {
00088 
00089 // custom version of filter iterator which doesn't look ahead further than
00090 // necessary
00091 
00092 template<class Predicate, class Base>
00093 class filter_iterator
00094     : public boost::iterator_adaptor<
00095         filter_iterator<Predicate, Base>,
00096         Base,
00097         use_default,
00098         single_pass_traversal_tag
00099     >
00100 {
00101     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00102     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_adaptor<
00103         filter_iterator<Predicate, Base>,
00104         Base,
00105         use_default,
00106         single_pass_traversal_tag
00107     > super_t;
00108     typedef filter_iterator<Predicate, Base> this_t;
00109     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME super_t::reference reference_type;
00110 
00111     reference_type dereference_impl(){
00112         if(! m_full){
00113             while(! m_predicate(* this->base_reference()))
00114                 ++(this->base_reference());
00115             m_full = true;
00116         }
00117         return * this->base_reference();
00118     }
00119 
00120     reference_type dereference() const {
00121         return const_cast<this_t *>(this)->dereference_impl();
00122     }
00123 
00124     Predicate m_predicate;
00125     bool m_full;
00126 public:
00127     // note: this function is public only because comeau compiler complained
00128     // I don't know if this is because the compiler is wrong or what
00129     void increment(){
00130         m_full = false;
00131         ++(this->base_reference());
00132     }
00133     filter_iterator(Base start) : 
00134         super_t(start), 
00135         m_full(false)
00136     {}
00137     filter_iterator(){}
00138 };
00139 
00140 template<class Base>
00141 class remove_whitespace : 
00142     public filter_iterator<
00143         remove_whitespace_predicate<BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Base::value_type>,
00144         Base
00145     >
00146 {
00147     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00148     typedef filter_iterator<
00149         remove_whitespace_predicate<BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME Base::value_type>,
00150         Base
00151     > super_t;
00152 public:
00153 //    remove_whitespace(){} // why is this needed?
00154     // make composible buy using templated constructor
00155     template<class T>
00156     remove_whitespace(BOOST_PFTO_WRAPPER(T) start) :
00157         super_t(Base(BOOST_MAKE_PFTO_WRAPPER(static_cast<T>(start))))
00158     {}
00159     // intel 7.1 doesn't like default copy constructor
00160     remove_whitespace(const remove_whitespace & rhs) : 
00161         super_t(rhs.base_reference())
00162     {}
00163 };
00164 
00165 } // namespace iterators
00166 } // namespace archive
00167 } // namespace boost
00168 
00169 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_REMOVE_WHITESPACE_HPP
